job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Minimum Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Must have experience on DevOps tools </li><li>Bachelor’s Degree in related field preferred; proven industry experience.</li><li>8+ years of software engineering, site reliability, architecture experience.</li><li>Experience supporting a 24 x 7 global operations environment with on-call responsibilities for production support.</li><li>Experience in supporting Disaster Recovery procedures</li><li>Experience in developing software applications using agile methodologies.</li><li>Experience in identifying application/infrastructure risks and mitigation strategy and the ability to work with a team to ensure risks are mitigated.</li></ul>
